title: Hanamaru
description: A Go-based **discord bot** with a bunch of Japanese-learning utilities and a spoonful of useless image editing features.

title: Geta
description: Split bill calculation for going to restaurants in the US. _Me when the only other good app to do this is an iOS exclusive._ (Temporary logo)

title: Ongaku
description: An [openings.moe](https://openings.moe) inspired website with more up to date openings and endings

title: Boushi
description: A smartphone controlled 2D Array of LEDs on a graduation cap

title: Mari
description: A peer-to-peer file sharing service that utilizes WebRTC and uses React for the frontend. This is a replacement for reep.io.

title: Reverse Game
description: A Mario-like game that was supposed to be that you reset Mario levels but just ended up being a mario clone.

title: lovelive-hd-ur-*
description: I wrote this just so I could get AI upscaled wallpapers of SIF cards by pressing a button on my phone. Actually one of my favorite projects as I've rewritten it in 4 different languages (Rust, Typescript, Kotlin, and Go).

title: llwikiaapi
description: An API for the Love Live Wikia Page. This was so that I could look at lyrics and listen to songs and not get judged at school... In hindsight though people would probably judge me for lookin at a wall of text vs a nice looking webpage but meh, I don't care about _judgement_ from reading text.

title: This Website
description: Yeah, I don't know what else to say about this one.
